Text: In a dream...?
I want more hints.
Geez. \nDid you already forget what I just said? \n...Well, if I had to tell you one thing...
This isn't the Tower of Sol. \nThe place where your fairy made its nest is far away.
Oh? \nIt seems like it's about time.
This time, shall we call it a day here? \nIt was fun.
As a token of gratitude for entertaining me, I will tell you one more thing.
I am Tia. \nI am neither on anyone's side, but rather a neutral and impartial being.
Tia...
Well, nice to meet you. Looks like we're going to be together for quite a while, huh? So, from now on, I'll tease you... and take care of you, too.
We've known each other for long...?
That's right. \nEven if you dislike it. \nYou and I will meet again soon.
I think you already know, but... \nYour story is far from over.

There are countless unresolved problems, and there are people waiting for help. There are enemies sharpening their claws, waiting for a chance. The scene I'm about to show you is also part of your story──
Struggling as much as you can, hero. I'll have a cup of tea and have some fun watching you...♪
Waaan, Mami-neee-chan~! \nWelcome back~!!
I'm sorry, Tae-chan, I'm just a useless older sister who only plays games...!
Uwaa~n, Guild Master~!!
We meet again, my dear friend! Goraahhh...!
I see, so this is...
She's back...
Little Brooooootheeerrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!!!!!!
Wow!!?
It's big sis! \nIt's big sis!! \nIt's big sis, right?!?! It was me~~~~!!!
Just as we promised over there!! Your big sister is the first one to rush over!!! Because your big sister is the one who holds my little brother's destiny──
Oh my, my hands slipped. I almost hurt Shizuru-san...
...Geez, Eriko-chan? \nWhat will you do if you hit your little brother? \nThere's no recovery magic on "this side," you know?
No matter if it's "here" or "there". There is absolutely no way I would harm the path of destiny. Tehehe...
... *stares in silence*
From somewhere, a gaze...
...Haah, Senpai... \nEven 'here', you're still wonderful... \nI-I should observe you more closely...
*Stare*
*Stareeee*
Cicadas...!?
Wow... \nNinon-san...! \nCalm down, calm down...!
Ha! I'm sorry, des! \nIn "real life", I couldn't use my magic to turn invisible... \nNin-nin!!
So, um, did I use that kind of magic over there...?
...I can hear the sound of cicadas. \nThose cicadas are trying to take advantage of the Great Tree known as "that person"...
I can't, I can't... I must eliminate all the bugs that follow that him. Hehehe...♪
- Huh!?
Mmmph! \nLooks like we've been found! \nIn that case...
Dear, dear, me~!!
Aaah! She left on her own...!?
Yes! \nI am always the Shogun's faithful retainer! Des!
...Ah, me too! \nI'm always looking at you, Senpai~!!
Of course, I am always your big sister, little brother! \nFrom good morning to good night! \nIn games or in "reality" too!
...I should have come back, but...
"Shogun!" \n"Senpai...♪"
"Little brotheer!!"\n"The one of fate...♪"
Somehow, it feels like nothing has changed?
